Description: Pottery reis shabti with painted detail: a black curled lappet-wig, a modelled face, crossed hands in relief holding the crook and the flail, a white tunic with pleated sleeves and a triangular apron inscribed with illegible black painted Hieroglyphs; a fake(?).
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Somerset Lowry-Corry, 2nd Earl of Belmore
